name: Document-based Customer Support
description: ● Need: Quick and accurate responses to customer queries using existing documentation ● Industry: Customer Service, IT, Telecom, Retail ● Applications: Chatbots, Virtual Assistants, Knowledge Base Q&A

name: Compliance and Regulatory Assistant
description: ● Need: Easy retrieval and summarization of compliance and regulatory documents. ● Industry: Finance, Healthcare, Legal ● Applications: Compliance management, Automated audits, Legal advice bots

name: Medical Knowledge Base Retrieval
description: ● Need: Quick referencing of medical literature for diagnosis assistance. ● Industry: Healthcare, Pharmaceuticals ● Applications: Diagnostic support, Clinical decision systems, Medical research assistance

name: Technical Documentation Assistant
description: ● Need: Efficient retrieval of technical documentation and troubleshooting guides. ● Industry: Engineering, Software Development, Manufacturing ● Applications: Internal IT support, User guides, Technical troubleshooting bots

name: Academic Research Assistant
description: ● Need: Efficient summarization and retrieval of research papers.● Industry: Education, Research Institutions ● Applications: Research paper synthesis, Literature review automation, Thesis assistance

name: Legal Case Retrieval Assistant
description: ● Need: Fast and reliable referencing of legal precedents and documents. ● Industry: Legal, Corporate Law ● Applications: Case research, Legal briefs preparation, Automated legal support

name: Product Information Retrieval System
description: ● Need: Quick access to detailed product information for customers or internal teams. ● Industry: Retail, E-commerce, Manufacturing ● Applications: Product support chatbots, Customer self-service, Internal sales training.

name: Real-Time Market Intelligence Assistant
description: ● Need: Timely retrieval and summarization of market intelligence and news articles. ● Industry: Finance, Investment Firms, Market Research ● Applications: Investment decisions, Financial market updates, Competitive intelligence
